title: Ainslie Says Coronavirus Worse Than 2008 Financial Crisis
itunes:title: Ainslie Says Coronavirus Worse Than 2008 Financial Crisis
description:
Former Lehman Brothers Chairman Michael Ainslie discusses the corporate crossroads and challenges presented by the coronavirus outbreak. He says the pandemic has impacted so many segments of the business world that massive federal action is necessary.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
